short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button on Amazon product pages that lets you quickly compare the price of the product across all Amazon stores in Europe.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save money when shopping on Amazon by comparing the price of a product on all Amazon stores in Europe. 

How? Amazon has different prices on all their European storefronts and even when you include shipping costs you can save quite a lot of money simply by ordering the product from a different Amazon store. 

You can either check the prices manually by opening all stores in separate tabs or you can use this simple Chrome extension that adds a button on every Amazon product page that you can click to check the prices for you. 

It's fast, easy, free and can save you some cash. Get a good deal on Amazon, get amadeal.io :)
